original_text: The men in charge of the work were diligent, and the repairs progressed under them. They rebuilt the temple of God according to its original design and reinforced it.
korean_text: 기술자들이 맡아서 수리하는 공사가 점점 진척되므로 하나님의 전을 이전 모양대로 견고하게 하니라

sentences.original_text: The men in charge of the work were diligent
and the repairs progressed under them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 수리가 그들의 감독 아래 진행되었습니다

sentences.original_text: They rebuilt the temple of God
